Squawktalk: I'll never shut up! I know everyth---

Slaughter bites of Squaw=
ktalk's head and ends the chattering. There were probably bots cheering.

S=
hokaract: Oh, that can't be good, can it?

Shokaract stumbled over into a w=
all and looks at the multiple images of Slaughter killing Squawktalk...

  =

  From: LurkerAbyss 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 7:57 PM
  Subject: Re: More Slaughter!
=


  ::Slaughter::
   
      Slaughter enjoyed the taste of a chunk of Squaw=
ktalk.
   
      "Shutup, you loud-mouthed BIRD-BRAIN!!!!"  Slaughter yelle=
d.
   
      Slaughter then tried to bite Squawktalk's head right off, or a=
t least his beak.

 Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 3:32 PM

 =
         ::Slaughter::
           
              Slaughter's hunger was slo=
wly going away, thanks to Shokaract's beast mode legs.

        "I'm bored of you!!  Slaughter shall eat the BIRD!!!!" Slaughter ye=
lled.
           
              Slaughter spun around on his heel, slime an=
d saliva from his body flying from his body, then he looked at Squawktalk.
=

ter shouted again.

ng to grab him with one of his pincirs and shove Squawktalk into his mouth =
